'''Ben''' is the husband of [[Victoria]].

==History==
Ben's wife, Victoria, had vascular dementia. She was living in a nursing home, where he had to watch her fall in love with [[Daniel Cobb]], another resident. When he heard that Daniel was in a trial, he asked if Victoria could get into it, but Derek informed him that it was only for Alzheimer's dementia.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Victoria]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*He and [[Allison Cobb]] bonded over being the left-behind spouses.
